Headline: #21 Cermak Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #21 buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses will operate in both directions via Cermak, Loomis, Archer, Halsted and Cermak. 

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Sedgwick
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Sedgwick due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are running with delays at Sedgwick due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
